definition: ornamental limestone rock (供石[gong1 shi2]) from Yingde 英德[Ying1 de2], Guangdong
stone (British unit of mass equal to 14 pounds (about 6.3 kilograms))
United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: My goal is to be 57st by the end of the year.
sentences.chinese: 我的目标是在今年年底达到57英石。

sentences.english: Quartz is a stone commonly found in the Gold country when looking for gold.
sentences.chinese: 石英石是一种常见于我国的黄金时，寻找黄金。

sentences.english: The most highly sought stones in China are black Lingbishi and slate gray Yingshi.
sentences.chinese: 在中国最受追捧的的岩石当属灵壁石和灰色英石。

sentences.english: Other equipment such as machinery for quartz stone.
sentences.chinese: 其他设备，如五头石英石扫平定厚机等。

sentences.english: He had a weight of 15 stone or 210 pounds or 95 kilograms.
sentences.chinese: 他的体重为十五英石，即两百一十英镑或九十五公斤。

sentences.english: The effect of zircon micropower on the structure and properties of magnesia castable were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了锆英石微粉对镁质浇注料结构及性能的影响。

definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
scholar's rock (one of the naturally-eroded, fantastically-shaped rocks put on display indoors or in gardens in China)
high-quality ink stonemade in Duanxi and Guangdong
jade/jade and stone/(fig.) the good and the bad
Karakax County in Hotan Prefecture 和田地區|和田地区[He2 tian2 Di4 qu1], Xinjiang
